title: Common API Error Response Envelope
description: Defines the common structure for all API error responses.

message.description: A human-readable message corresponding to the status code.

error.description: Error message describing what went wrong.

logged_in.description: Indicates if the user is considered logged in for this request.

timestamp.description: Response timestamp in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss+HH:MM).

data.description: Additional error data, if any. Can be null or any type depending on the error.

validation.description: Validation error details, present only when the error is related to request validation.

schema.description: The name of the JSON schema that failed validation.

missing_fields.description: List of required fields that are missing from the request.

request_data.description: The request data that failed validation (only included in non-production environments).
